clues.text: Van Gogh's "Self-Portrait with Pipe and Bandaged ____"

To mark a product incorrectly

clues.answer: the Winter Palace for the Romanovs

clues.text: Inducted in 1977, this American who'd been laden with gold at Munich 5 years earlier

1993:This 4-time Olympic gold medalist who did much of his swimming following a dive

Early scientific instrument used to measure the altitude of celestial objects
